interactables.name: Interactable Fountain
dialogue: Birds gather on this fountain to bathe sometimes. You have a habit of chasing them away when they group up.

interactables.name: Interactable Gravestone
dialogue: You cannot make out any letters on the gravestone, so you cannot tell who died.

interactables.name: Interactable House Door
dialogue: This is your house. You've lived here for as long as you can remember.
